answers.answer: we don't know the exact causes.  there are some exposures that have been linked to this condition such as presence of gestational diabetes in the mother.  we also know that viral infection have been linked with it as well. finally, there are some genetic causes such as chromosome 22 microdeletions.

question: Hello,I was born with Tetrology of Fallot. I have been though a lot but am doing okay. I was just wondering about the causes of Tetrology of Fallot. Does anyone know what causes children to be born with this birth defect?Thanks you.K.M.
title: Causes of Tetrology of Fallot
